title: ReactHookForm
intro: This is a simple demonstration of a form using React Hook Form. Type an email and password to move onto the next form step.

description.validation: React Hook Form provides extensible API's to be able to interact with the entire form submission process. In this form due to the process being a series of steps, I am able to manually trigger validation on select fields. For each step I only trigger validation for the controls on the page.
description.conditional: I also conditionally require the other field if the chosen selection is other.
